title: I got Black Alistar for one game......

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I play Alistar on the occasion when I have to support. When i do play Alistar I play with the Long Horn Alistar skin, which is the only Alistar skin I own. As I load in I say to myself "What the **. I put on Longhorn Alistar " and then suddenly my friends and I in the Teamspeak start to realize that I have a very expensive(500 euro/$544 according to LOLSkin shop) and rare skin equipped. I don't know how this happened but I would like MY BLACK ALISTAR BACK. JK, just wondering if anyone knows how this happened; would love feedback. <3

Note: I checked my Alistar skins after this game and I still only had Longhorn. And sorry for the picture quality, it was taken from my phone quickly before the game loaded us in.

replies.body:
Hey Mecha Morris,

Thanks for the report! This was a result of a bug that surfaced with the new champion select. This issue should be resolved. If you're still experiencing this, please feel free to ping me!
Can we get black Alistar added to the shop for black history month coming up? It'd be great to add to the collection.
